header.description: The StormRunner Load plugin enables you to execute load tests as part of your deployment process.

step-type.name: Run Test

property-ui.label: Project Id
property-ui.description: The id of the project that contains the tests.

property-ui.label: Test Id
property-ui.description: The id of the test to run.

property-ui.label: StormRunner Server URL
property-ui.description: The StormRunner Load server URL, e.g. https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com

property-ui.label: StormRunner User
property-ui.description: The user id to be used to connect to the StormRunner Load server.

property-ui.label: StormRunner Password
property-ui.description: The password to be used to connect to the StormRunner Load server.

property-ui.label: StormRunner Tenant Id
property-ui.description: The tenant id on the Storm Runner Load server.

property-ui.label: Debug Output
property-ui.description: Select this option to display debug output during execution.

step-type.name: Check Status
step-type.description: Check the status of load test run.

property-ui.label: Project Id
property-ui.description: The id of the project that contains the tests.

property-ui.label: Test Run Id
property-ui.description: The id of the test run to check the status of.

property-ui.label: Poll Status
property-ui.description: Poll the status until the test run has succeeded or failed.

property-ui.label: Poll Interval
property-ui.description: Interval in seconds between polls, default is 60s.

property-ui.label: StormRunner Server URL
property-ui.description: The StormRunner Load server URL, e.g. https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com

property-ui.description: The tenant id on the Storm Runner Load server.

property-ui.label: Debug Output
property-ui.description: Select this option to display debug output during execution.
